use_case.title: Modify Portal Name
use_case.description: A method for changing the name of an existing Portal.

trigger.value: The PA desires to change the name of an existing Portal

use_case.basic_path:
1. Starting at the Portal, A PA navigates to the Portal Configuration page by clicking the "Configure Portal" link
  2. On the Portal Configuration page, the PA selects the 'basic' tab.
  3. The PA then enters the new name for the Portal, and clicks save.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The name of the Portal is changed to the desired name.
use_case.open_issues: ince changing the URL of a portal is not available yet, will having the Portal name and the URL being wildly different confuse the user?
